Read LINX VisCopyNumber File

Source: R/linx.R
linx_viscopynumber_read.Rd

Reads the linx.vis_copy_number.tsv file.

Usage

linx_viscopynumber_read(x)

Arguments

x

Path to linx.vis_copy_number.tsv file.

Value

The input file as a tibble.

Examples

x <- system.file("extdata/linx/tables/linx.vis_copy_number.tsv.gz", package = "gpgr")
(l <- linx_viscopynumber_read(x))
#> # A tibble: 1,509 × 6
#>    SampleId           Chromosome    Start      End CopyNumber   BAF
#>    <chr>              <chr>         <int>    <int>      <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9              1  1488781       3.90 0.517
#>  2 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9        1488782  1488978       1.84 1    
#>  3 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9        1488979  9791045       4.00 0.518
#>  4 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9        9791046  9791110       2.05 0.941
#>  5 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9        9791111 11319306       3.63 0.551
#>  6 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9       11319307 11322933       6.23 0.703
#>  7 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9       11322934 14990057       3.84 0.526
#>  8 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9       14990058 14990108       2.01 1    
#>  9 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9       14990109 15484000       3.91 0.51 
#> 10 SEQC-II_Tumor_50pc chr9       15484001 18303655       2.12 0.975
#> # … with 1,499 more rows
